meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Anthony Curtis Alice Jackson Marissa Goldsmith Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6052.

td.p: Anthony Curtis, a pawnbroker from Great Falls, Montana
Alice Jackson, an adjunct instructor of art history from Birmingham, Alabama
Marissa Goldsmith, a web developer from Springfield, Virginia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,300)

tr.td: (Alex: We'll give you the station call numbers; you tell us in which city it's registered with the FCC.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Marissa: What is Colorado?)

Denver

MarissaAlice
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Impersonating [*]] Anthony, we will come to you first to see if you came up to the correct response.)
...
(Alex: Over to Marissa now, she said Dulles, John Foster Dulles, incorrect. If she risked a lot... and she did, $4,600, but she wins by one dollar!)
[Gasps]
AnthonyWho is Kissinger
$5,399
AliceWho is Jefferson?
$5,201
MarissaWho is Dulles?
$4,600
Henry Kissinger')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He was the last Secretary of State to serve in the post under 2 presidents')

tr.td: He was the last Secretary of State to serve in the post under 2 presidents

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
